summary: A treasure hunter finds a sunken Spanish galleon off the coast of a Philippine island. What he doesn't know is that the ship is guarded by the spirit of an ancient Moro princess.
cast: Jock Gaynor|Larry Ward|Diane McBain|Vic Diaz|Kim Ramos|Butz Aquino|Iraidaarambulo|Manny Ojeda
title: La calavera Virgen
